values: The present and future of the CREC, w Pastor Uri Brito

Pastor Jeffery speaks with Pastor Uri Brito, Pastor of Providence Church in Pensacola, Florida (CREC), and Presiding Ministro of the CREC Council, about the present and future of the CREC. They discuss the contemporary CREC landscape; Worship, culture, and the Christian life; posture, singing, and the body in liturgy and life; denominational maturation; “orthodox adaptability”; […]
